General.Name: Eugene Technology Co.Ltd
General.Description: Eugene Technology Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells semiconductor manufacturing equipment in South Korea. It offers single thermal LPCVD and plasma treatment, thermal and plasma enhanced ALD and LPCVD, mini batch ALD, and dry cleaning systems for use in LSI, NAND, and DRAM applications. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Yongin, South Korea.
